channel.title: Change prize shop
channel.description:
hello, i have some problems with my shop
so i changed the actual buy prices from items in npc shops, but they're still displaying a wrong price. How can i solve this? (for example: when i buy dragon claws i'll spend 5m, but the shopprice is still displayed as 1gp

item.title: Change prize shop
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Just use an shop editor

Read full topic
